text: Þis is þare feower hida land boc æt auene þe Eadgar cyng gebocade Wynstane his burþene on eche yrfe.
Þis synd þara feower hida land gemæra æt afene þe Eadgar cyning gebocade Wynstan his burðene on ece yrfe.
Ærest of afene on þa ealdan burhdic on þæne weg.

Ofer ðæne weg east swa Wulfsige hit gemærsode oð hit cymð to ðæm wege þe scæt fram hambres buruh to æþelware byrig oð hit cymð to þam wege þe scæt eastan fram winter burnan west to billan cumbe to þæm ealdan wuduforda.
Þonan up on midne stream oþ hit cymð eft fornangean þa ealdan burh dic.
